item.title: Friday's jobs report will be delayed because of the partial government shutdown
item.description: Following last year's record shutdown, the BLS also was forced to delay a number of its releases.

item.title: From PopMart to JD.com: Britain and China rush to forge business deals as diplomatic thaw takes hold
item.description: Chinese firms moved to pledge hundreds of millions of investment in the U.K. as Starmer's visit to China spurred a flurry of business deals and money ...

item.title: China's factory activity grows at fastest pace since October, private survey shows, beating official reading
item.description: The RatingDog China General Manufacturing PMI, rose to 50.3 in January from 50.1 the previous month, in line with analysts' expectations in a Reuters ...

item.title: Wealth inequality and the 'K-shaped' economy are more striking than ever, data shows
item.description: The K-shaped economy is as apparent as ever and isn't going away anytime soon, economists say.

item.title: Hassett praises Trump's pick of Warsh to lead Fed, says he has his 'dream job' already
item.description: The NEC director, once considered a clear frontrunner for the next Fed chair, said he is fine with his current role.
